pageSetting.title: 二次考核绩效查询

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select jxfp.tjrq ,jg.jgmc ,hy.hydh ,hy.hymc ,hylb.LBMC ,yyjg.yyjg ,jxfp.fpjx ,jxfp.bzsm from SGDR_ECKHJXFP jxfp left join khdx_jgcy cy on jxfp.khdxdh = cy.khdxdh and $tjny_ym$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq left join khdx_jg jg on cy.jgkhdxdh = jg.khdxdh left join khdx_hy hy on jxfp.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh left join khdx_hylb hylb on jxfp.khdxdh = hylb.khdxdh and $tjny_ym$ between hylb.qsrq and hylb.jsrq left join KHFA_YYJG_JG yyjg on 1=1 and yyjg.tjrq = $tjny_ym$ and jg.khdxdh = yyjg.khdxdh inner join KHFA_FAPZ fapz on yyjg.fabh = fapz.fabh and fapz.famc like '%二次考核绩效包%' and fapz.khdx = '1' and fapz.yyzlbh = 1 where 1=1 and jxfp.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and jxfp.tjrq between $tjny$01 and $tjny_ym$ order by jg.jgdh,hy.hydh

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select jxfp.tjrq ,jg.jgmc ,hy.hydh ,hy.hymc ,hylb.LBMC ,yyjg.yyjg ,jxfp.fpjx ,jxfp.bzsm from SGDR_ECKHJXFP jxfp left join khdx_jgcy cy on jxfp.khdxdh = cy.khdxdh and $tjny_ym$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq left join khdx_jg jg on cy.jgkhdxdh = jg.khdxdh left join khdx_hy hy on jxfp.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh left join khdx_hylb hylb on jxfp.khdxdh = hylb.khdxdh and $tjny_ym$ between hylb.qsrq and hylb.jsrq left join KHFA_YYJG_JG yyjg on 1=1 and yyjg.tjrq = $tjny_ym$ and jg.khdxdh = yyjg.khdxdh inner join KHFA_FAPZ fapz on yyjg.fabh = fapz.fabh and fapz.famc like '%二次考核绩效包%' and fapz.khdx = '1' and fapz.yyzlbh = 1 where 1=1 and jxfp.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and jxfp.tjrq between $tjny$01 and $tjny_ym$ order by jg.jgdh,hy.hydh ) t
